name: CurrentValueSubject
desc: A subject that wraps a single value and publishes a new element whenever the value changes.

items.name: init(Output)
items.desc: Creates a current value subject with the given initial value.

items.name: var value: Output
items.desc: The value wrapped by this subject, published as a new element whenever it changes.

items.name: func send(Output)
items.desc: Sends a value to the subscriber.

items.name: func send()
items.desc: Sends a void value to the subscriber.

items.name: func send(subscription: Subscription)
items.desc: Sends a subscription to the subscriber.

items.name: func send(completion: Subscribers.Completion<Failure>)
items.desc: Sends a completion signal to the subscriber.

declaration: final class CurrentValueSubject<Output, Failure> where Failure : Error
